incidents.description:
Idlewild and Margaret Wallace at Harris Teeter
5 unmasked men in tactical vests standing in harris teeter parking lot next to a black unmarked SVU talking

Independence  in Charlotte NC near large billboard advertisingMorris Jenkins air conditioning
Video of Unmarked White SUV and silver car both wirh with flashing lights stopped with red pick up truck. 2 men wearing camo/tan clothing detaining 2 people.

Two unmarked vehicles. Person in the comments (Chata Sanchez) of this linked video claims that someone was taken and his car is still there with the keys in it, however I am not able to see her story.
Video on Pueblo UNIDO of unmarked black van , black SUV, and white van all with flashing lights stopping silver SUV. Four men wearing face coverings and dark colored clothing detaining a man.
